Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, south of Evander's World of Weapons.
Room.LongDescription: The large shopping plaza to the north is called Evander's World of Weapons, where all kinds of weapons can be bought and sold. The entrance to the center is to the north. Kafkan Way intersects Leviathan Drive to the east, and continues west until it reaches the Necropolis at Amberton Lane.
